meanings.definition: Relating to a city or town
meanings.sent1: The municipal park is a nice place for families to enjoy picnics.
meanings.sent2: She works for the municipal government in our small town.
meanings.sent3: The municipal library had a book sale, and all the books were dancing!
meanings.sent4: The municipal buildings stood tall like guardians of the city.
meanings.sent5: The colorful banners lining the streets made the municipal area feel welcoming.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to local government
meanings.sent1: The municipal budget was discussed at the town hall meeting.
meanings.sent2: Residents pay municipal taxes to support community services.
meanings.sent3: The mayor's cat ran for a seat on the municipal council!
meanings.sent4: The power outage affected the municipal services, causing delays.
meanings.sent5: The municipal elections brought new faces to the local government.

meanings.definition: A local governing body, such as a city council
meanings.sent1: The municipal met to discuss road repairs in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: She was elected to the municipal and became the youngest member.
meanings.sent3: The municipal had a pizza party to celebrate a successful year.
meanings.sent4: The decisions made by the municipal impact the daily lives of citizens.
meanings.sent5: Attending the municipal meetings allows residents to voice their concerns.
